description.value:
Born with an extra set of arms, drones are especially skilled with their hands. Their hand-eye coordination and nearly doubled arm strength makes them exceptional builders, workers, and tenders. Meanwhile, their four-armed approach to fighting makes them a force to reckoned with in battle.
    However, drones are born with stunted, useless wings if any at all, leaving them without any form of vertical movement. This makes spotting a drone chk'tu far from its home or hive unlikely.

system.classDetails:
Drone Chk'tu Traits

  • Compatibility: Insectoid
  • Attribute Increase: Your Strength increases by 2.
  • Trade Proficiency: You are proficient in one Trade your choice.
  • Extra Arms: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.5QYD3QFDLZO2NKCD]{Extra Arms}
  • Multitasker: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.DSW72S4UGRPZ789H]{Multitasker}
  • Handsy: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.ND986T2ORMSDKFYJ]{Handsy}
  • Lifter: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.4F8FWF6AU6ZW5AWV]{Lifter}
